name: ListStyle
desc: A protocol that describes the behavior and appearance of a list.

items.name: static var automatic: DefaultListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes a platform’s default behavior and appearance for a list.

items.name: static var bordered: BorderedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a list with standard border.

items.name: static func bordered(alternatesRowBackgrounds: Bool) -> BorderedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a list with standard border.

items.name: static var carousel: CarouselListStyle
items.desc: The carousel list style.

items.name: static var elliptical: EllipticalListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an elliptical list.

items.name: static var grouped: GroupedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a grouped list.

items.name: static var inset: InsetListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an inset list.

items.name: static var insetGrouped: InsetGroupedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an inset grouped list.

items.name: static func inset(alternatesRowBackgrounds: Bool) -> InsetListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an inset list with optional alternating row backgrounds.

items.name: static var plain: PlainListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a plain list.

items.name: static var sidebar: SidebarListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a sidebar list.

items.name: struct DefaultListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes a platform’s default behavior and appearance for a list.

items.name: struct BorderedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a list with standard border.

items.name: struct CarouselListStyle
items.desc: The carousel list style.

items.name: struct EllipticalListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an elliptical list.

items.name: struct GroupedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a grouped list.

items.name: struct InsetListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an inset list.

items.name: struct InsetGroupedListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of an inset grouped list.

items.name: struct PlainListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a plain list.

items.name: struct SidebarListStyle
items.desc: The list style that describes the behavior and appearance of a sidebar list.
